title: 306.53 INTEREST PAID TO TREASURER OF BOARD.
text: On and after March 1 of each year, if the board of each cemetery has made its report and deposited the excess of interest as required by section 306.50, the county treasurer, under the warrant of the county auditor, shall pay to the treasurer of the board of directors of each cemetery acting under sections 306.41 to 306.54 its apportioned share of the interest from the cemetery fund.
